properties.name: max_files
properties.description: The maximum number of files that can be uploaded.

properties.name: max_size
properties.description: The maximum file size (bytes) that can be uploaded.

properties.name: min_size
properties.description: The minimum file size (bytes) that can be uploaded.

properties.name: multiple
properties.description: Whether to allow multiple files to be uploaded.

properties.name: no_click
properties.description: Whether to disable click to upload.

properties.name: no_drag
properties.description: Whether to disable drag and drop.

properties.name: no_keyboard
properties.description:
Create an upload component.

        Args:
            *children: The children of the component.
            **props: The properties of the component.

        Returns:
            The upload component.

properties.name: is_used
properties.description:
Create an upload component.

        Args:
            *children: The children of the component.
            **props: The properties of the component.

        Returns:
            The upload component.
